definition: good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
full moon/to hope/to expect/to visit/to gaze (into the distance)/to look towards/towards
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: A spotted hyena keeps its distance from an aggressive Cape cobra
sentences.chinese: 一隻黑斑鬣犬與一條好鬥的好望角眼鏡蛇保持距離。

sentences.english: The Cape sundew is easily propagated by seed or vegetative means.
sentences.chinese: 好望角毛氈苔很容易以種子或其他方法繁殖。

sentences.english: In the area just behind the Cape zone are the Cango Caves which are among the most beautiful in the whole of South Africa.
sentences.chinese: 毗鄰好望角的坎戈巖洞是南非最美的巖洞羣之一。

sentences.english: Fleur du Cap is one of South Africa's best known and best loved wineries .
sentences.chinese: 好望角是南非最著名且最受人喜愛的酒莊之一。

pinyin: Zhi2 bu4 luo2 tuo2 Hai3 xia2
Da2 da2 ni2 er3 Hai3 xia2

definition: the Bering Strait (between Siberia and Alaska)
